sub_title: Founder and Lead Editor of "AuthorsNEditors" I Providing best in the class Editing, Proofreading and Consultancy services I Experienced scientist of demonstrated history of work experience in diverse areas of biology I
summary:
Key Capabilities:

Extensive technical and project management expertise in the areas of Molecular Cell Biology, Biotechnology, Microbiology, Genetics and Biofuel based research

Highly skilled in Experimental designing, project execution, troubleshooting, grant writing, drawing SOPs, web designing and professional mentoring.

Strong functional and managerial skills-self driven, highly motivated, critical thinking, multi-tasking and can efficiently meet deadlines.

Experienced in handling multiple model organisms-Mammalian cell lines (RPE1, IMCD3, HEK293), Algae (Chlamydomonas reinhardtii, Chlorella sp., ) Bacteria, Baculovirus and Insect cell line.

Strong technical expertise in Genome editing, Molecular Cloning, Cell culture, Immunological assays, Immunofluorescence, Confocal and Transmission Electron microscopy, Proteomics, Protein Biochemistry.


MY COMPETENCES +:

Interdisciplinary team work, Friendly and open, Analytical, Good Laboratory Practice, Project handling, Writing and Editing abilities, Scientific data analysis, Review ability, Presentation skill, Time management, Managerial skills, Leading abilities, Training ability, Learning ability, Goal oriented, Optimistic. 

MY SKILLS  +:

. Scientific Research                  . Presentation skills
. Good Laboratory Practice       . Time management
. Scientific data analysis            . Managerial skills
. Project Management                . Leading abilities
. Writing and Editing                    . Training ability
. Grant writing                              . Learning ability
. Review ability                              . Blogging 		
                                                       . Creating and designing  customised website
. Computer (MS-office,                . Working with plants  (Green fingers) 
  office 365, Adobe Photoshop,       	       
  Knowledge of ICT)                            

LANGUAGES  +:

. English (Fluent, working proficiency)
. Dutch (Basic level, A2)

COURSES/CERTIFICATES +
. Dutch language (Level A2)
. Technical Support Fundamentals, ICT (by Google)
. Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP)

authors.headline: Founder and Lead Editor of "AuthorsNEditors" I Providing best in the class Editing, Proofreading and Consultancy services I Experienced scientist of demonstrated history of work experience in diverse areas of biology I

profile_positions.description: AuthorsNEditors is a unique platform which not only provides editing, proofreading and consultancy services but also hosts a knowledge sharing platform for scientific, technological, and medical blogs. The services are available to individuals from biotech and Pharma companies, institutions, universities, colleges, schools.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Lead Editor

profile_positions.description: Experienced with scientific/medical writing and editing of research papers, review writing, proofreading, systematic reviewing etc.
profile_positions.title: Scientific writer and editor

company.name: Institute of bioinformatics and applied biotechnology

profile_positions.company: Institute of bioinformatics and applied biotechnology
profile_positions.description:
Completed 03 yrs as a Young Scientist Awardee at IBAB, India. I worked on “Understanding the role of Nuclear and Nucleic acid binding proteins in ciliary signaling and cell division”. Successfully identified important ciliary proteins, RuvBL1 and TPPP and determined their role in cilia formation and cell division using ciliated model systems, Chlamydomonas and Human Retinal pigment epithelial cells. 

Experience on Project management: Handled multiple projects along with working in laboratory. Highly organized with extensive project management experience in handling various stages of project development and can efficiently meet deadlines. Strong background in experimental designing, execution, trouble shooting, drawing SOPs professional mentoring and data management. Strong functional and managerial skills, self driven, highly motivated, critical thinking, multi-tasking and can efficiently meet deadlines. 

Experience on product development: Actively involved in designing and custom-building an algal growth chamber with programmable temperature, humidity, photo- periodicity and sterile airflow control. 

Technical expertise: Gained expertise in gene cloning, transfection, protein expression, purification, antibody generation and purification, vector designing and gene sequence analysis, centrifugation, ELISA, Chromatography, cell and tissue culture. Throughout this study I have used several microscopy techniques like fluorescence, confocal etc.

Assay design: As a part of algal biofuel research programme, we established microtitre plate based large scale screening platforms for lipid efficacy as well as growth, through which we had characterized several new strains of micro algae from environmental resources that can produce high amounts of TAG. Studied biofuel production capabilities of several laboratory strains/mutants of model green alga Chlamydomonas reinhardtii. Studied lipid biosynthesis pathway to identify target genes through computational approaches.
profile_positions.title: Scientist (Molecular Cell Biology)

company.name: Yale University, Department of Molecular Cellular and Developmental Biology

profile_positions.company: Yale University, Department of Molecular Cellular and Developmental Biology
profile_positions.description:
Worked as a Post Doctoral Research Associate  at Yale University, USA wherein I worked on a couple of research projects involving “Identification of new ciliary tip proteins” and “characterization of new transition zone components” using human retinal pigment epithelial cells (RPE1) and Chlamydomonas as model systems. Experienced with several molecular and cell biology techniques like gene cloning, gene transformation and transfection experiments in Chlamydomonas as well in retinal pigment epithelial cells. Used several imaging techniques like fluorescence, confocal and electron microscopy.

Experience on Project handling: Handled multiple projects along with working in laboratory. Highly organized with extensive project management experience in handling various stages of project development and can efficiently meet deadlines. Strong background in experimental designing, execution, trouble shooting, drawing SOPs professional mentoring and data management. Strong functional and managerial skills, self driven, highly motivated, critical thinking, multi-tasking and can efficiently meet deadlines.
profile_positions.title: Post Doctoral research Associate (Molecular Cell Biology)

profile_positions.description:
Worked on “Characterization of Entomopathogenic microbials as Biopesticides against Lepidopteran tea pests”  where we have identified several novel bacterial (Bacillus thuringiensis) and viral entomopathogens (Baculovirus) of tea pests and assayed their bio-activity against Lepidopteran tea pests. We also tested their efficacy in large scale field experiments. Through this work I have learned techniques of cell culturing (insect cell culture), bacterial and viral (baculo virus) culture etc.

Experience on Project handling: Handled multiple projects. Highly organized with extensive project management experience in handling various stages of project development and can efficiently meet deadlines. Strong background in experimental designing, execution, trouble shooting, drawing SOPs professional mentoring and data management. Strong functional and managerial skills, self driven, highly motivated, critical thinking, multi-tasking and can efficiently meet deadlines.
profile_positions.title: Ph.D (Life Sciences, Applied Biotechnology)
